ingredients.ingredient: 2 pounds stew meat, trimmed and cubed
3 (10.75 ounce) cans condensed cream of chicken soup

cookingTips: Cook egg noodles separately and add just before serving to prevent them from becoming mushy
Cook on low for 6-7 hours until beef is very tender
Stir occasionally and adjust seasoning to taste
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Should I brown the meat first, and how do I time the noodles so they don't overcook?
